LanguageData.VRE_Ecstasy.label: екстаз
LanguageData.VRE_Ecstasy.description: Carriers of this gene can psychically connect with the target briefly, granting them a sense of ecstasy and making them fall in love with the caster.
LanguageData.VRE_FilterInfection.label: інфекція фільтра
LanguageData.VRE_FilterInfection.description: Carriers of this gene have special glands in their mouths that allow them to filter infected blood from the clean blood.
LanguageData.VRE_Hemosmosis.label: гемовичавлювання
LanguageData.VRE_Hemosmosis.description: Carriers of this gene are able to drain blood from their environment, provided there is blood to be drained there.
LanguageData.VRE_ToxicCloud.label: токсична хмара
LanguageData.VRE_ToxicCloud.description: Carriers of this gene are able to excrete a thick toxic smoke from special organic reservoirs in their lungs. Tox gas is deadly to almost every creature.
LanguageData.VRE_HeartCrush.label: серцевинос
LanguageData.VRE_HeartCrush.description: Носій цього гена має особливі адреналінові залози, які даю змогу їм знаходити серце суперника і виривати його в шаленій люті.
LanguageData.VRE_ViscuousGoo.label: в'язка слизь
LanguageData.VRE_ViscuousGoo.description: Carriers grow glands in the neck that generate and store a thick goo. They can spit it over long distances and cover several people in a viscous goo that will slow them down.
LanguageData.VRE_Resurrect.label: воскресіння
LanguageData.VRE_Resurrect.description: Carriers have a reserve of unique resurrector archites which can infuse a corpse, rebuild degenerated tissue and kickstart the vital processes. This brings the dead back to life - though possibly with health issues. This can only be done very rarely, and comes at a steep hemogen cost.
